job description:
Data Entry Analyst
Job Overview:
  • Our developer platform enables LinkedIn to drive growth, engagement, and monetization globally by delivering on partnerships, in collaboration with product, engineering, business development, and other cross-functional teams. You will work alongside a great team of Partner Engineers to drive innovation through our APIs, developer platform, and partner integrations.
  • We are looking for smart, high energy, and passionate service-oriented people who are looking to make a big impact. Partner Operations Engineer is the point of contact for day-to-day issue management for external developers building on our platform. This person will assist developers during integration with our APIs and support post-launch technical issues.
Responsibilities include:
  • Accurately copy, type, enter information from one system to another.
  • Clean up, reformat and wordsmith where necessary.
  • Configure our community forum and help center
Basic Qualifications:
  • College senior or grad
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Excellent attention to detail required
  • Strong organizational skills are required
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
  • Computer skills are required
  • Experience understanding and following instructions and procedures quickly and timely
  • Provide high quality work and meet deadlines
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or Equivalent degree and/or experience
Personal Attributes:
  • Ability to multi-task and perform in a fast-paced environment with good time management skills
  • Results-oriented individual who can make a difference; willing to take the initiative and make things happen, accepts accountability, and has a "can do" attitude.
  • Action oriented self-starter and quick learner; not afraid to roll up their sleeves and get into the details; has a sense of urgency
